statements: UPDATE catering_menus SET menu_name = 'Summer Menu', menu_description = 'Fresh and Delicious', menu_items = '{"main_dish": "Grilled Salmon", "side_dish": "Roasted Vegetables"}' WHERE menu_id = 1;
UPDATE catering_menus SET menu_description = 'Special Holiday Menu', menu_items = '{"main_dish": "Roast Turkey", "side_dish": "Cranberry Sauce"}', menu_name = 'Holiday Feast' WHERE menu_id = 2;
UPDATE catering_menus SET menu_description = 'Updated description' WHERE menu_id = 1;

UPDATE catering_menus SET menu_items = '{"appetizers": ["Spring Rolls", "Calamari"], "main_courses": ["Grilled Salmon", "Beef Tenderloin"], "desserts": ["Tiramisu", "Cheesecake"]}' WHERE menu_name = 'Special Dinner Menu';
UPDATE catering_menus SET menu_price = 15.99 WHERE menu_id = 1;
UPDATE event_schedules SET event_location = 'Ballroom A', start_time = '14:00:00' WHERE event_id = 10;
UPDATE catering_menus SET menu_name='Special Dinner Menu', menu_price=75.99 WHERE menu_id=1;
